mapper.delete: DELETE FROM cutting_tool_bindle_records WHERE 1 = 1 and id = #{id}

UPDATE cutting_tool_bindle_records SET
product_line_equipment_code = #{productLineEquipmentCode},
product_line_parts_code = #{productLinePartsCode},
product_line_axle_code = #{productLineAxleCode},
